item.title: 【Live Audios (lossless)】FLAC - Michael Monroe + Motorcycle Boy @ Whisky A Go Go 2025-04-12 August 22, 2025
item.description:
LIMITED TIME / LAST TIME


Hidden Content:
You must either reply or click 'Like' to see the hidden information contained here.


Motorcycle Boy is a little rough, especially at the beginning. The most packed I have ever seen the Whisky


MICHAEL MONROE
WEST HOLLYWOOD, CA @ WHISKY A GO GO
2025-04-12

SP-CMC-4U -> A10 -> Soundforge -> FLAC

11. Ballad Of The Lower East Side

13. One Man Gang
14. Horns And Halos
15. Boiler (Me Boiler 'n' Me)
16. Boulevard Of Broken Dreams

18. Hammersmith Palais
19. -intro-
20. Rock 'n' Roll (with Jim Dandy)

22. Up Around The Bend
23. Magic Carpet Ride (with Slash)
24. Dead, Jail Or Rock 'n' Roll (with Slash)
